lead.title: PalmBridge
lead.text: A interface between android software tools

sections.title: project description
sections.text: VSC smart supply chains runs a custom flexible package to help its clients manage logistics projects. Palmbridge is a android application that connects high end optical scanning libraries and complex navigation software.

sections.title: my role
sections.text: I was approached as a technical specialist to integrate these systems; I designed and specified the interactions between software and implemented the application.

sections.title: technology
sections.text: The software is a standard Java Android application including some C libraries for advanced scanning using the NDK.

sections.title: client
sections.text: VSC build software to support complex logics networks - integrating navigation, IoT tools and warehousing services.

sections.title: current status
sections.text: PalmBridge is in use but hundreds of drivers and warehouse users to assist with their jobs.
